In England, in the seven days to 20 October, there were 276,265 new confirmed cases (488.5 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 13 October, there were 240,133 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 15% (36,132 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 25 October is 7,494,992 (13,253.7 cases per 100,000 population).
